entities.name: madam pomfrey
entities.description: Madam Pomfrey is a person who is alarmed by the distant roar of fury and angry voices. She is staring at the door and expressing concern about the noise disturbing others.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Severus Snape is a person who is also present in the scene and is reacting angrily to the situation. He is accusing Harry Potter of something related to Apparition or Disapparition.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is a person who has been locked up and is somehow involved in the commotion that Snape is reacting to.

relationships.description: Severus Snape accuses Harry Potter of something related to Apparition or Disapparition, as indicated by the text: 'THIS — HAS — SOMETHING — TO — DO — WITH — POTTER!'
Madam Pomfrey is concerned about Harry Potter's situation, as indicated by the text: 'Harry has been locked up'.
